keyEvents.title: Luffy and Franky Pursue Yeti Cool Brothers
keyEvents.description: The snowy mountains serve as the battleground for Luffy's fight against the Yeti Cool Brothers.
keyEvents.significance: The terrain gives the Yeti Cool Brothers a home advantage with their knowledge of the icy landscape.

keyEvents.title: Law Proposes Alliance
keyEvents.description: Law proposes the historic pirate alliance to Luffy on the snowy mountains of Punk Hazard.
keyEvents.significance: The location of this pivotal moment in the series, where the alliance that leads to Doflamingo's and Kaido's downfall is proposed.

description: The frozen, snowy side of Punk Hazard island, covered in ice and snow. This harsh terrain is the domain of the Yeti Cool Brothers who use the environment to their advantage.

keyEvents.title: G-5 Marines Battle Caesar's Forces
keyEvents.description: The G-5 Marines engage in combat with Caesar's centaur and satyr subordinates across Punk Hazard.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the ongoing conflict on the island between multiple factions.

description: A former government research facility island in the New World, split into a burning side and a frozen side due to the battle between Aokiji and Akainu. Currently occupied by Caesar Clown who conducts illegal experiments.
